profile.greeting: Welcome to Hacademy {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience.

email.not_found: We can't find any user with email {{email}}. Please enter again or create a new one?.

cart.prevent: Sorry, your account need to be connected to facebook.
cart.payment: Do you want to pay now?
cart.error_code: The CODE was used or entered incorrectly.

survey.prompt: Hi, the survey only takes about 1 minute. We will always hear from you and keep improving in the future. Thank you!
survey.rate: Your satisfaction level about our application [1-5]:
survey.content: Do you think Chatbot is useful? Do you want us to improve or modify any feature?
survey.thanks: Thank you. Your survey has completed
survey.rate_warn: Sorry, your rate must be from 1 to 5. Please try again

schedule.get_started: Choose your course you want to get reminders.
schedule.no_course: You haven't paid for any courses
schedule.days: Enter your days in week (Eg: 'monday, wednesday, friday' or 'daily' if you want to get notification everyday)
schedule.invalid_time: Your time is invalid. Eg: '20:30', '15h10', 2:30 pm, ...
schedule.invalid_days: Your days is invalid. We accept values: [sunday - saturday] / [0 - 6] / 'daily', separated by commas.
schedule.success: Thank you. Your reminder was created successfully!
schedule.failed: Thank you üòÅ. Do you want to use another features?
schedule.confirm: Are you sure you want to create reminder?

help.support_0: ‚Ä¢ Your account (belong to https://cafocc.web.app) needs to be connected to facebook to fully use the features.
help.support_1: ‚Ä¢ You can ask anything for Chatbot. Eg: 'How to connect to my Facebook account', 'I want to receive reminders for the course every 5h pm on Monday, Wednesday, Friday', 'Can I check my cart?', ...
help.support_2:
‚Ä¢ If you are not already connected to facebook, you can:
 - Login (Connect account with facebook)
 - Sign up (Create a new account connected to your existing facebook account)
 - Survey (Give feedback to the developer)
help.support_3:
‚Ä¢ If you are already connected to your Facebook account:
 - Update Profile
 - Change Password
 - Forgot Password
 - Check Your Cart
 - Add Coupon
 - Schedule (Plan for courses that have been purchased, receive notifications (messages / emails) within the scheduled time)
 - Survey

corona.world: A summary of total cases updated daily in the world.
corona.vietnam: Do you want to get summary of Viet Nam?
